name: Granny's House: Horror escapes
description:
◎ Scary House Escape ◎
-------------------------------------------------------

There was a rumor that is wandering around the unknown scary, abandoned house. A weird granny kidnapped the kids at night.

Dorothy trapped in the scary house by the suspicious granny who kidnapped the kids!!

How do you escape her from the scary house?

-------------------------------------------------------

Enjoy the first 'Escape' asymmetric survival mode, with which 2 seekers vs. 6 hiders of hide and seek that everyone is familiar with. The players will be either creepy seeker or kids and will pursue a breathtaking chase.

◎ Survivor ◎

-You must collect 3 parts and open the escape way to escape the scary house.
-Rescue the children trapped in prison by the creepy seeker, and escape together!

◎ Granny ◎

-Go through the house, catch all the kids, and put them in jail.
-You can win if you put all the kids in prison.

Your choice and strategy will determine the win or loss of the game!



======================
● Scary House Escape Game Features ●
======================


◎ Fear, Fear, Fear. Breathtaking horror lurking everywhere! ◎

- Shattered building, creepy sound, scary seeker chasing after me!
- Everything in the creepy house fills you with fear!

◎ Attractive or characterful ◎

- Little cute kid, Dorothy or Granny is looking creepy and menacing!
- Customize the character you want!

◎ Play together! :) ◎

-Cooperation with team members is essential to make a winning strategy!
-Communicate actively and win!

◎ All actions have a record! ◎

- Granny? Or Dorothy? Can you guess who the real best winner is?
-Various rankings and rewards are prepared according to the accumulated amount of experience.
-Test your skills to the extent!


==================================================
We plan to add various contents through future updates.
Thank you for your continued interest and support!

* Subscription : We offer a subscription service called `Eliot's Detective Club`. This service is charged to your iTunes Account. Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase.
